sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Action) The character may commit force dice (white d12). For every full encounter force dice (white d12) remains committed, the character heals 1 wound he is suffering per rank of Healing Trance. This is in addition to wounds healed due to natural rest or other abilities. If in a situation without defined encounters, the GM can have Healing Trance take effect every 12 hours.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Healing trance</name> <number>TAL0001055</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 23:15:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4d90e324db2e0c542901de90cf961962</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 23:15:21</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
